Introduction Alzheimer’s Disease (AD) is a chronic, progressive neurodegenerative disease that gradually deteriorates memory and cognitive abilities, and it is the most common cause of dementia in older people. In the world, there were more than 50 million AD sufferers in 2018. Worldwide, there will be 131 million persons with AD in 2050, and the socioeconomic cost will be 9.12 trillion dollars. Method For predicting five class classifications, 9 most popular Machine Learning models are used.
